attributes.description: Optional authority which issues the kind of id used in the id field of this object.
attributes.name: issuer

attributes.description: Optional organisation that assigned the id to the item being identified.
attributes.name: assigner

attributes.description: The identifier value. Often structured, according to the definition of the issuing authority's rules.
attributes.name: id

attributes.description: Optional identifier type, such as  prescription , or  Social Security Number . One day a controlled vocabulary might be possible for this.
attributes.name: type

meta_info.description: Type for representing identifiers of real-world entities. Typical identifiers include drivers licence number, social security number, veterans affairs number, prescription id, order id, and so on.
meta_info.name: DV_IDENTIFIER
